column1: Daily Rates for Multiple-Package Domestic Shipments
Rates do not include a fuel surcharge.
Hundredweight Shipment Rates per Hundredweight Unit
The minimum charge in 2003 for 3 Day Select shipments is based on an average of 15
pounds per package or $62.50, whichever is greater.  Shipment minimum is 200 pounds.
Note:  UPS 3 Day Select hundredweight rates are for both Commercial and Residential shipments.
